tool_description: Calculates shipping costs and delivery options for orders based on package dimensions, weight, destination, and carrier services.

carriers.description: List of carriers to get quotes from

error_messages: Invalid address: Origin or destination address cannot be validated.
Package dimensions exceed limits: Package too large for standard shipping.
Weight exceeds limits: Package weight exceeds carrier maximum.
No carriers specified: At least one carrier must be included in carriers array.
Unsupported carrier: One or more carriers in the list are not supported.
usage: Provide package dimensions, weight, origin and destination addresses. Optionally specify which carriers to get quotes from.

shipping_options.description: Array of available shipping options with costs and transit times
